transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji mam.
Customer: Haan, woh maine na baat toh kar li hai sir se, woh bol diya hai unko. Hmm. Toh unko, ji toh keh rahe itna time lagta, woh wohi tha ki itna time lagta hai itni si cheez pata karne mein, batane mein. Toh woh tha thoda sa unka. Accha, yaar I am really sorry but actually na woh account manager change ke liye bol rahe hain ki request aane ko.
Customer: Okay, no issue.
Executive: Hai na, theek hai aap woh bol rahe the ki woh sahi kar le. Aur rahi baat itni chhoti si cheez ko itna time lagta hai mam koi bhi cheez ho time lagta hai for sure. Kyunki aapki side se mistake hui thi, hamari side se nahi hui thi. Hmm hmm hmm. Main samajh rahi hu. Aur phir internal team, internal team check karti hai yeh cheeze hum toh nahi check karke bata sakte na ki kya fault hai jiski wajah se achanak calls aani band ho gayi hain. Hmm hmm hmm. Toh, theek hai koi baat nahi main aage, haan theek hai aage main aage ke liye bol deti hu.
Customer: Ji bataiye. Yeh Mansi ticket raise kar du iska?
Executive: Nahi main isko yahan se bol deti hu toh mere manager aapse connect kar denge iske liye. Toh aap unko ek baar yeh cheez bol dena. Kya bolenge unko? Matlab kya rahega? Main yeh bol, haan yahi cheez ki unko account manager change karwana hai toh aap ek baar unse discuss kar lijiye. Phir manager ko confirmation chahiye hoga ki phir woh aapko call karenge ki kya reason hai jiski wajah se account manager change chahiye hai. Toh aap woh valid reason bata dena woh change kar denge.
Customer: Ticket raise mein bata do mere ko unko yeh woh mangenge na mere se ki complaint ka toh hai isme kuch option ki kya dala hai, kya kara hai? Nahi nahi woh maine yeh ticket maine bhi bola tha, maine bola tha. Maine toh aapke liye bola tha abhi. Lekin jo kal aapke saath hua tha wohi mere saath bhi ho gaya na. Kyunki maine. Accha sir aapko bhi chala raha tha kya?
Executive: Woh ho gaya tha matlab like kaisi baatein kar rahi ho mam aap yeh hai woh hai matlab duniya jahan ke ho gaya. Toh main toh halki rehne ka accha theek hai sir main toh sirf aise bol rahi thi normally abhi. Is like ki sir pata hai kya hota hai Mansi ab like being a I am very senior about like in my hai na jo bhi mera hai career. But kya hota hai na. Nahi aapko nahi hai. Haan but kya hota hai na ki jab hum kahin kaam kar rahe hote hain toh hume na apne aap ko flexible banana padta hai. Kyunki samne wale ka haan nature kaisa hai kya hai agar hum chhoti chhoti baaton ko karenge na toh ab is like ki phir woh long term chalega nahi. And agar main baat karu toh he is a very matlab good person like bahut acche insaan hain. But ek baat mam dekho kal main us time woh frustrated the toh maine unse bola nahi nahi unko yeh lagta ki main behas kar rahi hu. Jo maine listing wala problem bataya tha jo woh bol rahe the ki nahi meri toh top listing aa rahi hai main aapko date wise bata sakti hu. Jaise sir bolte hain na data pe baat karo 18 September 25 ko unhone ek ticket raise kari thi customer care se hi, theek hai? Yeh puchne ke liye ki unki listing jo hai woh number one pe kyun nahi dikh rahi hai. Jo maine bola tha na ki calls duration kam matlab dikh nahi hota hai is wajah se calls aani kam ho jati hain dheere dheere. 18 September ko unhone khud raise kiya tha ki mera haan nahi nahi unhone isi cheez ke liye 18 September ko ticket dali thi ki mera listing jo hai woh top 10 mein matlab yahan pe first number pe kyun nahi dikh raha hai. Mera aathve ya nave number pe kyun aa raha hai. Tab bhi maine unki problem solve kari thi ki sir woh searching page hai. Wahan par aap agar do din bhi use nahi karoge aur agar aapne PNS calls wagera miss kar di toh woh listing automatic aapki down ho jati hai. Maine us down ki baat kari thi toh unko laga ki nahi mera catalog yeh log jaan bujh ke woh kar rahe hain. Balki yahi same concern ke liye hi dekho main aisa nahi hai ki main database dekh ke baat nahi karti. Maine database dekh ke hi baat kara but unko yeh laga ki main behas kar rahi hu ya unko jo bhi cheeze unke mind mein aaye I don't know ki kya tha. But dekho koi bhi cheez ho woh dekho ab jo mere haath mein tha woh toh maine kar diya, theek hai? Ab jo cheez internal mein hamare upar bhi faculty baithi hui hai, theek hai? Ab hum unko koi cheez bolenge woh toh apne hisab se kaam karengi na unke liye ek client toh nahi hai IndiaMART mein. Woh toh apne feet se hi kaam karengi unko toh yeh lagega na ki hamare upar toh star wale aur industry leader wale bhi baithe hain jo 20-20 lakh rupay deke baithe hain woh itna peeche nahi padte hain ki yeh cheez mujhe turant turant woh karke do. Dekho saari cheeze procedure wise hi hoti hain. Hum apni taraf se jaldi karne ka hi koshish karte hain maine aapko kal bataya bhi ki maine mail dala hua hai mam jaise hi revert aayega toh main bata dungi maine sham ko bhi call kiya toh unhone bola ki woh find kar rahe hain. But yeh itni chhoti si cheez thi ki woh kisi ke dimag mein nahi aaya ki yeh bhi able kara ja sakta hai idhar se. Kyunki sir itne saalon se hain na toh yeh hota hai na ki inko toh yeh saari cheeze pata hai ki yeh apni side se toh able nahi karenge us notification ko. But woh kari gayi hai taki calls aani band ho jaye aur woh maine aapko isiliye screenshot bhi bhej diya hai ki dekho jab maine cursor rakha hai na us pe toh woh hamari side se bata raha hai ki hum nahi kar sakte hain sirf admin hi kar sakta hai sheet ko. Toh na toh hum yeh laga sakte hain na hi hum usko hata sakte hain. Yeh aapki side se kiya pata nahi kisne kiya hai usi ki side se hi hua hai. Jabhi ek mahine se aapke paas koi call nahi ja rahi hain.
Customer: Accha. Accha chalo ek yeh cheez ho gayi ab mujhe yeh batao ki agar mujhe ticket raise karni ho toh kaise hogi account manager change ka?
Executive: Account manager change ka nahi mam isi pe hi hogi maine bola na ki jaise yeh ticket band nahi hui hai aur hamare yahan har ek ticket ko band karna compulsory hota hai tabhi toh maine aapse kal confirmation le rahi thi. But yeh ticket band nahi hui hai toh mere se aage kal bhi reason pucha gaya tha toh maine unko reason bataya tha ki yeh yeh cheez hai toh unhone bola theek hai unki problem jo bhi hai woh solve karke then mere ko batao kyunki yeh ticket hum nahi band karte hain mera manager band karta hai. Toh usko proper haan verification chahiye hota hai ki tumne kya resolution diya aur uski kya problem thi. Toh main abhi just mam abhi cabin mein hi hain main jaakar unse bol deti hu. Toh aapko. Accha ek baar ab hamara woh settings check kare ki change ho gayi hai ki nahi. Wait wait ek second. Uh uh yeh udhar hi hai na PNS. Abhi nahi abhi nahi hua hai abhi nahi hua hai. Accha abhi woh travelling mein hai maybe kar denge phir. Toh udhar se hi hoga. Par abhi hua nahi hai. Udhar se karte hain na woh suno udhar se karte hain mere ko inform karte hain then main is ticket ko close kara deti hu. Aur naya ticket kaise kaise raise hoga? Woh 96 pe hoga lekin woh aapki side se abhi close nahi hoga jab tak hum closer nahi denge. Matlab jab tak yeh wala ticket close nahi hoga tab tak dusra close dusra ticket raise karne ke liye bhi yeh wala close karna padega na hume toh jab haan aur woh close hum hi karenge udhar se apni side se hum jab tak close nahi karenge tab tak aap closer nahi de sakte ho. Toh main kaam karwati hu main yeh bol deti hu toh mam abhi aapko aadhe ghante ke pehle pehle hi abhi agar woh free honge toh 5-10 minute mein. Itni der toh hold karna. Haan bol rahe hain ki main karwata hu abhi. Message aaya. Theek hai theek hai. Theek hai? Toh yeh kara ke yeh batate hain toh phir main iska aapko bata dungi toh yeh ticket phir close kar denge. Haan yeh wali kar dijiye ga uske baad. Aur phir aap dusri kar dijiyega uske baad. Haan dusri kar lenge. And theek hai phir baki dekhte hain phir karti hu main baat aaram se. Hai na? Okay. Haan theek hai chalo okay bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change account manager.

- Customer had a similar issue previously.

- Customer wants to know how to raise ticket.



Resolution:

- Executive assured manager will connect for account change.

- Executive explained the ticket closure process.

- Executive shared screenshot for reference.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform customer about ticket status.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, ticket, pns calls, listing
